__e: I saw your movie-- what you said to that dog about soul mates.
And as for anyone who does, I'm having trouble seeing you and he as soul mates.
I knew then, like I know now, in my heart, we're soul mates.
Whether or not they're the souls of the dead, I don't know, but...
The souls of children... give me strength.
Let's pray together to our Lord for peace for the souls of the dead.
It is not 'for the souls of those girls.
A country soul is as good as a city soul any day in my book.
You've kept the souls of your wife and child off the chopping block.
I do, I pray for their souls and for mine,
The balance is only four souls... and that, as you now know, was not our contract.
And I am not going back there!
Surely, you of all people, know that some souls are not worth saving?
But there is a voice... in our souls... which tells us what to do.
So, For the sake of all the souls watching us right now,
But during a Blood Moon your very souls are in danger.
Our 219 guests are here, and their souls are ours for the taking.
All their souls are with me now.
